subject: Harness Racing
Hambletonian (Harness Race)
lead_paragraph: George Brennan guided Broad Bahn to a pace-setting 3 ¼-length victory Saturday in the $1.5 million Hambletonian for colts and geldings in East Rutherford, N.J.
snippet: George Brennan guided Broad Bahn to a pace-setting 3 ¼-length victory Saturday in the $1.5 million Hambletonian for colts and geldings in East Rutherford, N.J.
